attributes.action: Arm the entire British Police Force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United Kingdom would be alot safer place if the police were to be armed. Due to the increase in Gun and knive Related crime. 

The police are the protectors of this nation, and it is about time they had the skills and facilities to protect them selves and the public. 

Arming the police force would deter small time criminals and large orginised crime, fact being any average rank police officer would be a major hazard in their criminal  operations.
